!Beast Herder Tunatun: Aaah... Pastoral scenes like this make me wish I could see these cute little critters grow up! They look cute, but you can never forget that they're wild beasts! There's no way I can handle them all on my own... Do you know anyone who could help me raise them? It's a very dangerous job! It's not for just anyone... (Only a character of level 65 or above can undertake this quest.)
